settings.promo_text: Now offering complimentary shipping on all orders over $50!

settings.content: This is a demo store for the Turbo Shopify theme by Out of the Sandbox. For information on selling CBD on Shopify, check out this document.

settings.title: Discover Your Bliss
settings.subtitle: Our herbal CBD blends are packed with stress-relieving ingredients.

settings.title: Sleeping Easy
settings.testimonial: I love taking the Calm oil with hot coco before bed. I feel so calm and at ease which has helped immensely with my sleeping issues.

settings.title: Feelin' Good
settings.testimonial: CBD has helped improve my mood and make me an overall happier person. I no longer get overwhelmed or stressed out about the little things.

settings.title: After Exercise
settings.testimonial: I've been using the calm balm on my joints after a workout to help prevent any discomfort. It works like a charm!

settings.title: Quality Cannabinoid for Everyday Relaxation
settings.text: Look no further because we only believe in the good stuff.

settings.title: Did you know not all CBD is created equal?
settings.text: Isolate vs. full-spectrum. Discover what's optimal for you!

settings.filter_tags: New, CBD, THC, Oil, Tea, Softgels, Calm Balms, Skin Balms, Merchandise

settings.newsletter_text: Stay in the know, and receive 10% OFF your next Chicago purchase!

settings.title: Calm Balms
settings.text: Quickly nourish and relieve your irritated skin.

settings.title: We're here to help.
settings.text: We are a mindful collective with a focus on healing and wellness, looking to help people return to their authentic self. With our products, you can soothe your soul – and your joints!

settings.title: Something for everyone.
settings.text: We believe that our products help people and that they can have a positive impact on your every day life.

settings.title: Our effective approach.
settings.text: Not all cannabinoid products are created the same. We meticulously source our ingredients and are committed to bringing you only the very best.

settings.title: Feel the difference
settings.subtitle: Your body & mind will surely thank you later.

settings.title: What's the difference between THC and CBD?
settings.subtitle: THC and CBD are both natural compounds found in Cannabis however, THC is the psychoactive which gives you the feeling of being high, while CBD does not contain the same psychoactive effects.

settings.title: Does CBD help with health issues?
settings.subtitle:
Many people use both CBD and THC to help with various health conditions. These conditions include pain relief, seizures, inflammation, anxiety and depression. 

However, these products are not intended to diagnose, prevent, treat, or cure any disease.

settings.title: Can I use CBD in recipes?
settings.subtitle: Sure! It is very common to consume CBD by ingesting edibles or adding oils into your own recipes.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.subtitle: For orders in Canada, you should receive your items within 1 - 3 business days. For orders in the U.S, you should receive your items within 10 business days.

settings.title: How can I keep my products fresh?
settings.subtitle: To keep your products fresh and potent, store them in a dark, dry place and in an airtight container.

settings.title: Do you offer refunds?
settings.subtitle: No, unfortunately due to the nature of our products, we do not offer refunds.

settings.title: Built for speed. Styled with love.
settings.content: Turbo is a highly configurable, blazing fast theme that has been optimized for both speed and mobile experience. Turbo fully supports sections and is packed with features like product row sliders, mega menus, testimonials, homepage image gallery, FAQ template, interactive mini cart, team page template, and infinite scrolling. It also boasts features like instantaneous page transitions for ultra-fast navigation and two separate speed modes.

settings.title: Velocity, refined.
settings.text: Turbo is a fully-loaded theme that can easily accommodate high volume, large catalog shops and especially Shopify Plus merchants. But it's also an excellent choice for any size shop that's looking for an edge - one that won't sacrifice style and flexibility for enhanced performance.

settings.page_quote: 40% of online shoppers abandon a site that takes more than 3 seconds to load

settings.title: Turbo Theme Support
settings.content: Our comprehensive Theme Help Center is where you'll find extensive documentation and video guides for all our themes, including Turbo Support Articles. Updating your theme is also quick and easy, using our unique Shopify Theme Updater App!

settings.title: Benefits
settings.text:
Uplight & ease your mind. Our CBD infused teas reduce anxiety, stress and help your feel calm – without any psychoactive effects.

DOSAGE
Scoop 1/2 to 1 tsp and add it to 2 cups of hot water. 

INGREDIENTS

• 10mg natural hemp extract 🌿
• Blend of lavender, strawberry and peppermint

settings.subtitle: Subheading
settings.contact_content: Customize your contact form to suit your business! Add custom fields like a dropdown menu, checkbox, text fields and more, so that you can gather pertinent info from shoppers right from the get-go, to help answer their inquiries more effectively.

settings.title: Demystifying cannabis health benefits
settings.subtitle: Many people use CBD for pain relief, and to reduce stress and anxiety as there are a lot of healing properties

settings.title: CBD Beverages
settings.text: Infusing CBD in delicious beverages is truly the way to go! You can cool down with a nice drink while going into full relaxation mode.

settings.title: Is CBD Safe for Pets?
settings.text: Our company always recommends talking to your veterinarian before prescribing your pets a new medicine. We want our pets to be safe!

settings.title: Change Your Mood
settings.text: It's no secret that CBD has been a major game changer for those with anxiety. In this article, we dive into what CBD can do for you!
